nodes.text: Pit fighting was a sport played by two individuals. To win, a individual would have to kill his opponent. The Kanji and the Hutts sponsored several fighters at Nar Shaddaa's Garkata Fighting Arena. Doc Ragon also sponsored Boba Fett.
Pit fighting first appeared in Star Wars Legends in the video game Star Wars: Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast.
